name: Super Pizza Boy
description:
You are the let alone Pizza boy and Pizza land is at its final and depends on you. You traverse your way through Pizza land, Ketchupton and Pepperoni United only to find the king of Hamburgers preparing a attack to destroy all pizzas! -- story inspired by: SeaWattGaming's "The story of Minecraft's first raid."

Inspired by Papa Louie when pizzas attack.

IF THE GAME DOES NOT WORK,  DOWNLOAD THE DESKTOP INSTALLER! (windows only)

Music: DSTechnician :https://pixabay.com/users/dstechnicia... From pixabay.com

Arrow keys to move shift to jump space to shoot sauce

Esc. to exit and R to relaunch

Made for Weekly Game Jam Week 252

(THIS WILL BE UPDATED FOR A FULL VERSION. THIS IS JUST THE JAM EDITION)
